name: Calendar Planner
description:
A component set to help create calendars and planners really quickly.


Examples of use:

  • Weekly planner - I've used this to document how our sprint is structured to help new starters understand our meeting habits.
  • Sprint capacity - show others in your team, and other teams when you're available to work this sprint!
  • Monthly - use monthly view to plan far ahead, included January 2022
